models.consultationRequests: Each consultation request represents an inquiry submitted through the booking flow - capturing who they are, what they need, and when they'd like to talk.
models.formConfig: Configuration for the stepped form including project types, budget ranges, and discovery sources that appear as options.

relationships: Each ConsultationRequest captures one complete form submission
The formConfig defines the options available for project type, budget, and discovery source fields

consultationRequests.projectDescription: We're building an AI-powered analytics platform for e-commerce brands. Need a complete dashboard experience with real-time data visualization, custom reporting modules, and a clean onboarding flow. Looking for someone who can handle complex data displays while keeping the UX intuitive.
Climate tech SaaS for carbon footprint tracking. We have the backend ready but need the entire frontend built - user dashboard, admin panel, and public-facing marketing site.
Health and wellness app landing page. Need something bold that stands out from the typical calm/zen aesthetic in this space.
Web3 infrastructure SaaS. Developer-focused tooling for smart contract deployment and monitoring. Technical audience, needs to feel powerful but not intimidating.

steps.label: Tell me about your project
steps.placeholder: Describe what you're building and any specific requirements...

steps.label: What type of project is this?
When would you like to chat?

thankYouContent.heading: Message Received
thankYouContent.subheading: I'll be in touch within 24 hours to confirm our conversation.
thankYouContent.note: In the meantime, feel free to explore the work.
